languages.text: Друзианские проповедники, обретавшиеся на станции, обратились в мрачных аскетов, чьи тела были покрыты язвами и раздулись от болезней. Многих пустотников, уставших от грехов, привлекал этот новый устрашающий облик культа. Ходили слухи, что участившиеся технические поломки, отравлявшие целые астероиды, были делом рук друзианцев — так через страдания они вели свою паству к вере. Новой вере.

The Drusian preachers dwelling on the station turned into grim ascetics, ridden with ulcers and swelling with disease. Many voidsmen looking for redemption were attracted to the new forbidding image of the cult. Rumours abounded that the recurring technical breakdowns poisoning entire asteroids were the work of the Drusians, who led their flock through suffering to faith. A new faith.
languages.original_text: Друзианские проповедники, обретавшиеся на станции, обратились в мрачных аскетов, чьи тела были покрыты язвами и раздулись от болезней. Многих пустотников, уставших от грехов, привлекал этот новый устрашающий облик культа. Ходили слухи, что участившиеся технические поломки, отравлявшие целые астероиды, были делом рук друзианцев — так через страдания они вели свою паству к вере. Новой вере.

traits.locale_text: Drusian preachers, dwelling upon the station, turned into grim ascetics, whose bodies were full of ulcers and got swollen with diseases. Many Voidsmen, tired of sins, were attracted to the new daunting image of the cult. Rumours abounded that technogenic breakdowns happening more often than usual, that were poisonings entire asteroids, were the work of Drusians — who led their flock through suffering to faith. To a new faith.

To a new faith.

Many Voidsmen, looking for redemption, were attracted to the new forbidding image of the cult. Rumours abounded that the recurring technogenic breakdowns poisoning entire asteroids were the work of the Drusians, who led their flock through suffering to faith. A new faith.

The Drusian preachers dwelling on the station turned into grim ascetics, ridden with ulcers and swelling with disease. Many voidsmen looking for redemption were attracted to the new forbidding image of the cult. Rumours abounded that the recurring technical breakdowns poisoning entire asteroids were the work of the Drusians, who led their flock through suffering to faith. A new faith.

The Drusian preachers dwelling on the station turned into grim ascetics, ridden with ulcers and swelling with disease. Many voidsmen looking for redemption were attracted to the new forbidding image of the cult. Rumours abounded that the recurring technical breakdowns poisoning entire asteroids were the work of the Drusians, who led their flock through suffering to faith. A new faith.

languages.text: 落脚港的德鲁苏斯布道士变成了冷酷的苦行者。他们患上了溃疡，被病痛折磨得肿胀不堪。许多寻求救赎的虚空之子被教会可怕的新形象所吸引。有大量的谣言声称，许多小行星反复出现各种各样的技术故障，毒害着当地的人民，这一切都是德鲁苏斯教派的杰作。他们打算通过这样的手段，带领他们的牧群穿越苦难，走向信仰——一种新的信仰。
languages.original_text: The Drusian preachers dwelling on the station turned into grim ascetics, ridden with ulcers and swelling with disease. Many voidsmen looking for redemption were attracted to the new forbidding image of the cult. Rumours abounded that the recurring technical breakdowns poisoning entire asteroids were the work of the Drusians, who led their flock through suffering to faith. A new faith.

traits.locale_text: 落脚港的德鲁苏斯布道士变成了冷酷的苦行者。他们患上了溃疡，被病痛折磨得肿胀不堪。许多寻求救赎的虚空之子被教会可怕的新形象所吸引。有大量的谣言声称，许多小行星反复出现各种各样的技术故障，毒害着当地的人民，这一切都是德鲁苏斯教派的杰作。他们打算通过这样的手段，带领他们的牧群穿越苦难，走向信仰——一种新的信仰。

languages.text: Die Drusianer-Priester, die auf der Station lebten, wurden zu grimmigen Asketen, von Geschwüren geplagt, von Seuchen gezeichnet. Viele Raumfahrer auf der Suche nach Erlösung fühlten sich von dem neuen, finsteren Ruf des Kults angezogen. Es gab Gerüchte, dass die ständigen technischen Zusammenbrüche, die ganze Asteroiden vergifteten, das Werk der Drusianer seien. Angeblich wollten die Priester die Leute durch Leid zum Glauben führen. Zu einem neuen Glauben.
languages.original_text: The Drusian preachers dwelling on the station turned into grim ascetics, ridden with ulcers and swelling with disease. Many voidsmen looking for redemption were attracted to the new forbidding image of the cult. Rumours abounded that the recurring technical breakdowns poisoning entire asteroids were the work of the Drusians, who led their flock through suffering to faith. A new faith.

Viele Raumfahrer auf der Suche nach Erlösung fühlten sich von dem neuen, finsteren Ruf des Kults angezogen. Es gab Gerüchte, dass die ständigen technogenen Zusammenbrüche, die ganze Asteroiden vergifteten, das Werk der Drusianer seien. Angeblich wollten die Priester die Leute durch Leid zum Glauben führen. Zu einem neuen Glauben.

languages.text: Les prêcheurs drusiens de la station se transformèrent en sinistres ascètes boursouflés par les maladies et couverts d'ulcères. L'austérité nouvelle du culte attira de nombreux cosmomarins en quête de rédemption. Le bruit courait que les pannes techniques récurrentes empoisonnant des astéroïdes entiers étaient l'œuvre des Drusiens, qui menaient leurs ouailles sur la voie de la souffrance pour atteindre la foi. Une nouvelle foi.
languages.original_text: The Drusian preachers dwelling on the station turned into grim ascetics, ridden with ulcers and swelling with disease. Many voidsmen looking for redemption were attracted to the new forbidding image of the cult. Rumours abounded that the recurring technical breakdowns poisoning entire asteroids were the work of the Drusians, who led their flock through suffering to faith. A new faith.

traits.locale_text: Les prêcheurs drusiens de la station se transformèrent en sinistres ascètes boursouflés par les maladies et couverts d’ulcères. L’austérité nouvelle du culte attira de nombreux cosmomarins en quête de rédemption. Le bruit courait que les pannes technogéniques récurrentes empoisonnant des astéroïdes entiers étaient l'œuvre des Drusiens, qui menaient leurs ouailles sur la voie de la souffrance pour atteindre la foi. Une nouvelle foi.

languages.text: Los predicadores drusianos de la estación se convirtieron en ascetas sombríos, azotados por las úlceras y llenos de enfermedades. Muchos hombres del vacío en busca de redención se vieron atraídos por la nueva imagen imponente del culto. Abundaban los rumores de que los persistentes accidentes tecnogénicos que envenenaban asteroides enteros eran obra de los drusianos, que dirigían a su rebaño por el sufrimiento hasta la fe. Su nueva fe.
languages.original_text: The Drusian preachers dwelling on the station turned into grim ascetics, ridden with ulcers and swelling with disease. Many voidsmen looking for redemption were attracted to the new forbidding image of the cult. Rumours abounded that the recurring technical breakdowns poisoning entire asteroids were the work of the Drusians, who led their flock through suffering to faith. A new faith.

traits.locale_text: Los predicadores drusianos de la estación se convirtieron en ascetas sombríos, azotados por las úlceras y llenos de enfermedades. Muchos hombres del vacío en busca de redención se vieron atraídos por la nueva imagen imponente del culto. Abundaban los rumores de que los persistentes accidentes tecnogénicos que envenenaban asteroides enteros eran obra de los drusianos, que dirigían a su rebaño por el sufrimiento hasta la fe. Su nueva fe.

languages.text: ステーションに住むドルスス教のプリーチャーたちは、潰瘍に冒され、病気で腫れ上がった冷酷な苦行者と化した。贖罪を求める多くのヴォイズマンは、カルトの新しい禁欲的なイメージに魅了された。小惑星全体を汚染するような技術的故障が繰り返されるのは、苦しみを通じて信仰に導くドルスス教の仕業だと広まっていった。新しい信仰である。
languages.original_text: The Drusian preachers dwelling on the station turned into grim ascetics, ridden with ulcers and swelling with disease. Many voidsmen looking for redemption were attracted to the new forbidding image of the cult. Rumours abounded that the recurring technical breakdowns poisoning entire asteroids were the work of the Drusians, who led their flock through suffering to faith. A new faith.

languages.text: İstasyonda yaşayan Drususçu vaizler, ülserlerle kaplı, hastalıklar nedeniyle şişmiş, çirkin bir görünüşe büründüler. Günahlarından arınma isteğindeki birçok uçsuz eri, tarikatın bu yeni haşin görüntüsüne çekiliyordu. Artan söylentiler, asteroitleri topluca zehirleyen, tekrar eden teknik arızaların Drusçuların işi olduğunu söylüyordu. Takipçilerini acı vasıtasıyla inanca itiyorlar deniyordu. Yeni bir inanca.
